website_summaries.verdict: Heat controls give you more control over this artisan-style oven.
pros: Double-layered ceiling bakes like a brick oven
Preheats and is ready to cook in 15 min
Very light and easy to move
Built-in valve ignition/micro-adjust valve gives you total flame control
Built-in temperature gauge monitors internal temperatures
disposable propane bottle or regulator with 5' hose to adapt to the standard bulk propane tank
cons: Oven may not get hot enough using disposable propane bottle
Use the full-size tank option instead

customer_reviews.title: Not Recommended
customer_reviews.text: I have had mine for two years. It looks like I now need to replace the regulator... if you read through the reviews, you will see others have had the same problem. I'm guessing the manufacturer is using a cheap regulator, there can't be this many reviews with regulator problems to conclude otherwise. I tried the reset procedure, etc. Still little tiny flame regardless of the control setting. Also, I too have had challenges not burning the pizza's (when the regulator was working). I have established a workaround process rotating and screens, but I wouldn't buy this again. I recommend you find a better solution than this oven.
customer_reviews.author: humble_rob

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Purchase, this is the one for you.
customer_reviews.text: We've owned this oven now for maybe 6 months. We make pizzas twice a week just about every week. This little oven gets hot, so be careful. Its just the right size for a 10'' pizza, they cook fast. Great little oven we love it! If your pizzas aren't coming out fabulous, its on you, not this great little oven! Just buy it and start having fum.
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: Was skeptical but
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME.. Not build like a tank, but more than does the job.. 300 degrees in 5 minutes. Suggestions: 1) Place pizza on parchment paper rathe than directly on the stone. easier, safer, cleaner 2) Keep the door enduring heating and off during cooking or pizza will heat too fast on the top and the crust will not be crisp. 3) Get a laser heat gauge. a MUST
customer_reviews.author: Just  a Customer

customer_reviews.title: This Oven Just Works!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this oven. We moved to Panama City a few years ago and the pizza scene here is horrible. One place on the beach sells Brooklyn style but picking up a slice was like picking up a paper towel with toppings. We ordered this oven and make our own crust with a cracker type bottom that doesn’t drool when you pick up a slice. The oven gets hot pretty fast with the door closed and only takes a few minutes to get to the type of pizza we love. I do have to rotate it about every 20-30 seconds. The cover keeps it clean and taking the cooled stone out to scrape is easy.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Amazing little oven that could...
customer_reviews.text: The Camp Chef pizza oven is amazing... yes it really heats up to 750F if there’s no wind... with a breeze it will maintain about 550F. Either temp will create some amazing pizzas. Check out that leopard spotting in the pics. I’m coming from a custom Weber Kettle Pizza and this Camp Chef is easier to use and better results. I have also used it to make a ciabatta bread and a sourdough bread... and it’s my new favorite way to make chicken wings!!! Only downside is the label on top that you have to peel off. It leaves a lot of residue that I had to scrub with alcohol to remove.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly Bakes Pizza Crust!
customer_reviews.text: The Camp Chef pizza oven is wonderful! We purchased a “damaged” pizza oven for a deeply discounted price through Amazon. It was scratched up on the inside of the oven and dented on the outside, but I took it apart and repaired the dents. Even damages the oven heats well and evenly. The pizza crust comes out perfectly baked with a little turning during the baking process. We enjoy having it at the lake so much we are considering buying one for home use.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie D

customer_reviews.title: great pizza until the oven breakdown
customer_reviews.text: we enjoyed our pizza oven for the past 2 years but lately the ignitor pilot broke down and it has been a nightmare to get one replaced. A company is as good as its customer service in time of need when part replacement is needed. After all it is not like we are asking free part replacement . This review is to let chef camp know that they should really care and pay attention to the after sales of their equipment when it breaks down and to take care of clients in a timely manner.
customer_reviews.author: Washington

customer_reviews.title: Camp Chef Italia Artisan Pizza Oven
customer_reviews.text: I really like the looks of this oven, it is very classy. I am having a learning curve trying to use it. I am burning the bottom of the pizzas. It seems to have more heat at the bottom than the top even when it is pre-heated. I pre-heat to 650 and then dial back a little bit and the bottom still cooks to quick. Usually have to finish off the top of the pizza in the microwave. I will keep trying to tweak it and update this review if I can get the results to improve.
customer_reviews.author: harry hopkins

customer_reviews.title: This oven is perfect! Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I have researched pizzas ovens for the last month and actually bought a pelleted oven first but it was way to difficult to maintain and control l the temperature. This oven is perfect! Beautiful, easy, perfect size and great price! could not be happier with the outcome of the pizzas :) My only wish is that camp chef would have this oven available to Canadians
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: By far the best value for the cost in the medium size pizza oven space.
customer_reviews.text: The Camp Chef pizza oven was our third effort to find a reasonably priced pizza oven that worked well and allowed us to do a good range of high temp cooking. It has exceeded our expectations at a cost of less than half of some of its more advertised competitors. The temp goes to around 750 easily and can stay there thanks to the door provided and the internal space is generous. We cook plank salmon, pizza, pretzels, and other items in this with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Weingartner

customer_reviews.title: Good one
customer_reviews.text: I do my due diligence before buying anything and i have to admit this one was a pleasant surprise. It does exactly what it’s supposed to do. Crust was baked evenly and heat was distributed evenly on top. I started making pizzas using a cheaper model however one side always more baked than the other. If you enjoy making pizza don’t buy the cheap one. This will do.
customer_reviews.author: farzad alipour

customer_reviews.title: 6 stars and more!
customer_reviews.text: Love this little oven. Set it up at my farmstand and it pumps pizza out all day long. Fits 2 10" pies. They come out perfect! Done in under 3 min! I built a huge 10k lb brick oven but its a lot of work to get it started. This guy is ready in 15 minutes and the pizza tastes just as good. It looks good and its durable. Well worth the money. But the peel set up with cutter as well. And scraper. You need that scraper.
customer_reviews.author: Teddy Ted

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Results!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful results! When I received my pizza stone I assembled it only to find the Stone was broken during delivery. The package was upside down on my porch so it might have been that. I contacted the company and they got me a replacement in a little under half the time they estimated. This oven heats up to 550 in about 20 minutes, I do New York Style (using Babish’s New York Style Pizza dough and sauce) so I don’t need to go higher than that. Take a look at the pictures for the results! Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Charles K

customer_reviews.title: Not getting hot enough
customer_reviews.text: The first day i used this the flames comes out of the burner where decent. Now the flames are exactly the same if i have it on high or if i have it on low. I have tried adjusting the propane regulator to no success. I am pretty disappointed, the first day the pizza's came out awesome. I wonder if maybe im doing something wrong?
customer_reviews.author: SlickRick

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pizza oven. Has made pizza time so much fun around here
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Makes my pizza taste amazing. One note, if using the big refillable propane bottles do not open the valve fast or,all the way. Just crack it a bit is all it takes. If you crank it open you can trip off the regulator then you’ll need to reset it by taking the hose off. It fits up to a medium sized pizza. If you want to cook larges then you’ll have to cut them in half.
customer_reviews.author: 50ae

customer_reviews.title: Pizza Oven
customer_reviews.text: I would have given it 5 stars if they would have had a heavier piece of metal in the center of the heat zone. I placed one there to keep the center of the pizza to keep it from getting burned on the crust's center. Otherwise, it does an excellent job. Just needs a touch more for function in its design/
customer_reviews.author: mack

customer_reviews.title: Burning all the food
customer_reviews.text: Burning the pizza to charcoals and service the camp chef are very very not professional the answer for the problem was old Pizza app it's going to cook faster and the second answer don't food topping on the pizza overall service are -100. Not happy with service not happy with product. Highly recommended not to buy.
customer_reviews.author: TSS

customer_reviews.title: Good oven, short but unavoidable learning curve
customer_reviews.text: I've had a infrared thermometer for years, but if you don't you will need to use one when using this or any other unfamiliar oven. That said, I'd say it will take most people a few tries to get temps and times right for their style of pie. Use parchment paper to slide it off the peel. After a bit you can always slide it off the parchment and directly on the stone, but you don't have to. Experiment with shapes, move the pies around including off the stone and closer to the top of the oven as needed. Have fun.
customer_reviews.author: Tucson turner

customer_reviews.title: Have a good rolling pin and plenty of Pizza paddles to keep pizzas waiting to go in the oven
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Husband for Christmas he loves to make personal Pizzas on New Years Eve and he loves cooking. We made the best pizzas ever everyone raved about how perfect the crust was. We found that 625 degrees is the perfect temp for a thin crust And they cook fast ! Perfect for parties. . I ordered the pizza tools and 2 bamboo pizza paddles Im ordering 4 more that way you always have the next pizza ready to put in . And we used a large propane tank.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Zitting

customer_reviews.title: Best home cooked pizza ever
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. I'd write a long one but let's just say don't waste money on a monster unless that's your thing. But small but I've mastered cooking pizzas for groups anyway. I use it weekly or so. Love that it gets so hot. I cook at 600+ and everyone loves it. Ingredients are critical. I like dough and sauce from Trader Joe's. Take some practice time and it will become a regular for home pizzas.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Turner

customer_reviews.title: Ciao Bella!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this oven based on research and former reviews. Right from the box the oven performed outstandingly until I tried using it with the length of propane hose. Was majorly disappointed until I called customer service. The young lady that assisted me had us back up and running in two day with a replacement hose. There is a small pin valve, similar to a tire valve, that had become bent. This did not allow full flow of gas from the tank to the regulator. But, now we are in full swing cooking pizzas as often as possible and always with fantastic results. I highly recommend this product for it's efficiency and portability.
customer_reviews.author: Large Marge

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this oven today and had to try it. There was a cook book included that has a super artisan pizza dough recipe, so that's what we tried. We made 4 pizzas one at a time and the 1st was a little doughy on the bottom so we did not let itpreheat long enough. #2 & 3 were perfect and # 4 got burnt. When we checked the temp it was about 625 degrees. Too hot. The crust tasted great with a good crunch and was still chewy. The oven had minimal installation and was easy to set up. Seems to be great quality. Will update after a few more pizzas have been cooked.
customer_reviews.author: Tony L. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and product.
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this pizza oven. It takes practice to get the hang of using it. But, it performs perfectly. Uses very little propane and gets very hot. It’s easy to set the heat you want and it cools down fairly quickly. I definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Wilder

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: So far, after only a couple pizzas, I love this maker. Could not get it over 650 degrees but cooked the pizza. Still working to see if I can improve. Might get the heat higher if I do not use a small propane can.
customer_reviews.author: robert abraham

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pizza oven for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. We were considering outdoor gas pizza ovens that cost more than $4000 and we wanted to be sure we really wanted a pizza oven first. Now that we have it, we don’t see any reason to spend more. It’s fantastic. Heats up quickly, cooks pizzas in about 4 min. It does take some getting used to so that you don’t get it too hot and burn the bottom of pizzas before the rest is cooked. So far, we leave the door off and let the temperature come down a bit between pizzas and that seems to work. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: l. gundy

customer_reviews.title: Great pizza oven.
customer_reviews.text: I had to dock it 1 star due to the fact that sometimes it won't stay lit. I have to disconnect the hose from the back, reconnect, then it will stay on. Not sure exactly why it does this but its annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Joesuph

customer_reviews.title: The unit looks good but mine would not get very hot
customer_reviews.text: The unit looks good but mine would not get very hot. I sent a email to support but they never responded. I replaced the regulator from my local supply and now works good. So if you buy this unit do not depend on support from the manufacture but if you're lucky enough that it works out-of-the-box it does cook a good pizza
customer_reviews.author: Bernard  Eymann

customer_reviews.title: Well built unit that makes great pizza!
customer_reviews.text: I like the stainless steel construction. Very easy to assemble out of the box. It bakes pizzas fast!. The thing I don't care for is the fiddly knob for the lighter and gas control. The person that commented on having a warmer instead of an oven, try heating the oven with the setting before it locks. A few tries with that knob and you'll see what I mean. It's a well built unit and I would purchase it again. Last word of caution, front cover is HOT.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: No significant complaints so far.
customer_reviews.text: Initial impressions are so far I am not disappointed(despite the lack of attention to detail - missing screw for the door handle... which is not easily found at the local HW store). Price seems commensurate for what you get. I will adjust the stars accordingly and update review after more use.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Reliability
customer_reviews.text: Quality of pizza great but I started having issue with this Owen after month where gas switch turn off after lightning it. Very frustrating as it stop working in middle and I had guest come over to test pizza. I am going to call support during business hours to see how they turn around this issue. It happened multiple times and now it needs to fix
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This oven rocks!
customer_reviews.text: We are loving this pizza oven! We use it at least 3 times a week! It gets HOT!! A tip... don’t open your propane tank valve all the way! Just about a 1/3 turn open. Opening all the way can cause the oven to stay on low heat! Works like a charm!!
customer_reviews.author: Lena

customer_reviews.title: i put an adjustable regulator on this and i tell ...
customer_reviews.text: i put an adjustable regulator on this and i tell you what this over is incredible. I now can have oven and stone temps around 350 all the way up to 600 to 700 degrees .sky is the limit with this thing when camping
customer_reviews.author: tim

customer_reviews.title: if you are looking at this, it's a good oven
customer_reviews.text: gets real hot ! pay attention if you are reading the Fahrenheit or Celsius scale for the temperature. If the oven is too hot ( easy to do ) remember that even if the gauge shows the temp has gone down, the stone will still be much hotter. Amazing little oven and has the advantage of being a backup cooking source in extended power outages as it uses it's own propane tank. Maybe not the cheapest one out there, but a worthwhile purchase if you are already looking for this kind of thing. I am happy with and I am using it to make different breads like pita which need hot ovens.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Lapitsky

customer_reviews.title: Great oven, easy to use, fun for having a pizza party.
customer_reviews.text: Nice oven, easy to use. We have used it for two pizza parties and were pleased with how fast it baked the pizzas. It made serving a crowd easy without long waiting periods. It was easily set up in the patio area where guests could prepare the pizzas themselves with a variety of toppings. Delicious and fun. Our only problem was a broken handle on the front cover but, after calling costumer service, it was quickly replaced by the company with no charge.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Great Pizza Oven.
customer_reviews.text: The perfect pizza oven. Cooks great artisan pizza in less than 10 minutes. Paid $235. Now $400? Seriously? Glad I bought mine when I did. Bought it in February 2020. Better alternates for $400.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hurley

customer_reviews.title: Tempeature as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Still wondering how to get pizza cooked as commercial pizzas. Very hard to deal with over-cooked top and still-wet bottom.
customer_reviews.author: sbobby

customer_reviews.title: My dude loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our anniversary & my guy loves it! I did also buy the Seville Classics Heavy-Duty Utility cart & Weber Q-300 Grill Cover for it. He keeps it between his Weber Genesis gas grill & his Kamado charcoal grill. Now our food paradise is complete. He has made decent size pizzas, but he is on a calzone kick at the moment. He loves it & I enjoy eating whatever comes out of it!
customer_reviews.author: Rhamy Marango

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 3 times and 5 weeks!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great twice. Today we tried to use it for the 3rd time and the fuel knob won't adjust temp. Only goes low and not hot enough to cook pizza. As horrible luck would have it the 30 day return policy expired 12 days ago. Have had it less than 6 weeks. So upsetting!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine J.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use !
customer_reviews.text: I like this... No I love it! Easy to setup and use. Love making pizza. A great Oven for the money. It cooks pizza great! You may have to make a few pizzas to get the hang of it... Small thin crest is the best. You should use a good pizza dough too. At 600 make pizza in less then 6 mins. Enjoy
customer_reviews.author: Robert Lotito

customer_reviews.title: Amazing pizza oven!
customer_reviews.text: We love this oven! We’ve made pizza so many times since buying it, and the flavor and speed of cooking is amazing. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kflan

customer_reviews.title: my cousin purchased one of these ovens in Jul 2015 ...
customer_reviews.text: my cousin purchased one of these ovens in Jul 2015,and I had a chance to try it last labor day weekend. this is why I purchased mine. I baked several pizzas using this oven and it rocks. It heats supper fast and the pizza crust comes out as if you purchased it from a New York Pizzeria. I can't wait for the weekend to get started, I've already purchased 30 lb of flower.
customer_reviews.author: Naim-Reno

customer_reviews.title: Love it !
customer_reviews.text: We love how easy it is to reach cooking time, makes it fun to use. I did a little upgrade by adding some handles to help move it around, because I take mine in the RV so we can have those pizza dinners at camp. I would like to know about a replacement stone, just in case. Anyone have that information?
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this item in June. It has been a huge hit. Family loves it. We've used it for multiple bbq nights. Guests all oooh and awwh about the great flavor of the pizza from the pizza stone in this unit. Super easy to use. We have a friend that has the option where you put it on your propane stove. This is so much better. We even took it camping. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MKMac

customer_reviews.title: Great little pizza oven
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this little thing. Gets HOT. Gets hot FAST. Great for pizzas and breads. Super easy. Fun for the kids to make their own pizzas ( I cook them though :))
customer_reviews.author: Dean Carter

customer_reviews.title: Best pizza oven for its class!
customer_reviews.text: I own Mystic Pizza 2 in Ct, I know pizza ovens. Its really good oven. get a brush for the stone.
customer_reviews.author: Harry Spanos

customer_reviews.title: Perfect family pizza oven
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding pizza oven! Works great. Heat up and cool down is quick. Cooks 2 small pizzas simultaneously. Perfect for family use
customer_reviews.author: Jeanine Stark

customer_reviews.title: Defective Regulator
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I were so excited to use this. We set it up, got the pizzas ready and the regulator is defective. We took it apart 3 times to try to make it work. A HUGE DISAPPOINTMENT!!! VERY UNHAPPY CUSTOMER!
customer_reviews.author: Laneka5

customer_reviews.title: Best Gift ever
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift bought for my sister in law for her birthday.. She loves it and cried when I gave it to her.....She had bought one for herself and gave it as a gift to one of the kids for their home before she got to use it....so I surprised her with it... They use it weekly and actually love it...
customer_reviews.author: Robert Drake DAVIDSON

customer_reviews.title: Great addition.
customer_reviews.text: Got this gem for Christmas. Built my own stand for it. Works great love it
customer_reviews.author: Douglas

customer_reviews.title: wow
customer_reviews.text: outstanding....this monster will hit 700F in 15 minutes or so- not that you would use it like that but just saying....well made and a real improvement in the pies around here
customer_reviews.author: misterfingers

customer_reviews.title: Great pizza At Home
customer_reviews.text: This is very easy to set up and use. I made great pizza from the very first use. It gets up to 700 degrees within about 15 to 20 minutes.Its about as close to wood fired pizza at home as you can get without spending a huge amount on an oven. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Earth Mom

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: My stone came all chipped. So now I can’t even use it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Sorensen

customer_reviews.title: Love this pizza oven- first use I burned the crust
customer_reviews.text: Love this pizza oven- first use I burned the crust, so we cook the pizza on low, works every time. Crust is perfectly done. Highly recommend this oven for outside use.
customer_reviews.author: K. D. Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: I just bought the camp chef italia pizza oven. Upon opening the package I discovered that the pizza stone was cracked in two spots and there was a chunk broken and in a bunch of pieces. Also was missing the propane hose and door and handle. Not happy at all
customer_reviews.author: Jim Reger

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, lower temps better for taste, lower cornmeal too but love this.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great oven once dialed in
customer_reviews.text: Awesome pizza oven! Make sure to only open your large propane tank a half turn. I was opening mine all the way and I couldn't get a full flame or past 450°. Called their support line and they got me cooking again.
customer_reviews.author: Sage Stark

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Weve had so much fun taking this camping with us. Happy purchase!
customer_reviews.author: nicole furness

customer_reviews.title: We absolutely love it! The pizza is amazing and is done ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my husband for Christmas. It's portable and you can put it right on your table top. We absolutely love it! The pizza is amazing and is done perfectly within 3-4 mins. He's also made calzone and stromboli with it! Would highly recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Carm

customer_reviews.title: Great for Sunday Fun Day!
customer_reviews.text: We just bought this pizza oven a couple months ago and absolutely love it. You have to work with it in the beginning to get used to the temperatures are your burn your pizzas. Everyone that has used it loves it! for this reason I gave it five stars
customer_reviews.author: Cheryll Puls

customer_reviews.title: When I took it out of the box, screws ...
customer_reviews.text: When I took it out of the box, screws were loose, one screw was stripped. I used it once and the inside metal panel over the burner is already all warped and doesn't set level in the oven. It's a kind of cheesy for costing so much. I would spend the money next time and get something a little more quality, even if it cost more!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Robin Orgeron

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described-heats to high quickly
customer_reviews.text: What fun!! Whole family has fun making quick and yummy out door pizzas. Heats to high temp quickly creating chewy inside and crisp outside.
customer_reviews.author: oheo

customer_reviews.title: Best Homemade Pizza
customer_reviews.text: Like how fast the pizza oven preheated to 650. The pizza took 3 1/2 minutes to cook! Easy to set up and hook up to a propane tank.
customer_reviews.author: MLStanley

customer_reviews.title: Best Pizza Oven
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pizza oven. Holds heat well and cooks pizza in 6 minutes Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Steele

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Came with a defective pipe, doesn’t work at all. Since it was a gift we could not return it due to the delivery window.
customer_reviews.author: Bob M

customer_reviews.title: Awsome
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this pizza maker. It heats up to 650* in 15 minutes and makes a great pizza. It is not heavy and easily moved from inside to outside for use (Garage). High quality and very attractive looking as well. I would by this again without a second thought
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Works great and cooks a pizza in no time at all
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Used it for the first time yesterday. Heats up fast, gets very hot (had to reduce the temperature to medium and was able to cook a pizza in less than 2 minutes). My only suggestion would be to add some sort of handle or other way to securely hold the entire oven while you move it. I have it connected to a large (500 gallon) stationary propane tank.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: I love this oven!
customer_reviews.text: This oven is AMAZING!!! it gets super hot and the temp is easy to control.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase ever! Love everything about his pizza oven- and it is so much fun to make your own personal pizzas! We leave ours sitting on an outdoor patio in AZ and we bought a cover- it's been holding up very well and heats the stone quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Garbe

customer_reviews.title: Professional grade
customer_reviews.text: Being in the pizza business for 28 years, this is outstanding product gets up to 750 to 800゚ with no sweat. It is all about the heat and cooking on the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Vittorio Rago

customer_reviews.title: Set up was easy and quick
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my father-in-law for Christmas. Set up was easy and quick. Fired it up and it got to 700 in less than 10 min. It has a good size cooking surface and the pizzas that we cooked were amazing. The crust was nice and crispy and had the charred edges I love. I can't say enough about this oven. If you like to make homemade pizza this oven will not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Darianis

customer_reviews.title: Small but mighty
customer_reviews.text: Loved making pizzas all summer worked great, extreamly hot use don’t use around kyour day.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Inkley

customer_reviews.title: Awesome oven!!
customer_reviews.text: Great results with this oven! Have used it numerous times for hours at a time. Really fast cook times and browns evenly on both sides! You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: ken s.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent- just getting to know how versatile
customer_reviews.text: Made the best pizza ever. Also made great biscuits. Look forward to using the oven on more pizza and other delights.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Schatz

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great.
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you get the temperate up to 600 degrees F prior to placing the pizza in there. This way, you get a nice crispy bottom. Keep an eye on the pizzas, the longer you cook, the faster the pizzas become done.
customer_reviews.author: C. Harris

customer_reviews.title: The perfect affordable Pizza Oven.
customer_reviews.text: This oven is as good or better than many of the thousand dollar ones. At the temperatures you cook pizzas gas works better than natural wood or charcoal.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Miller

customer_reviews.title: Best Pizza ever from this oven
customer_reviews.text: Awesome pizza oven. Had it three years and use it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: RLB

customer_reviews.title: Don’t expect Leoparding
customer_reviews.text: Don’t expect Leopard Spots because the flame doesn’t come up the back, but it makes a good pizza regardless.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Automatic Ignite isn't working
customer_reviews.text: The oven is great but my ignite isn't working and have to use a grill lighter to get it fixed. Otherwise it would be 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heats up quick lid for oven opening gets very hot ...
customer_reviews.text: Heats up quick lid for oven opening gets very hot make sure to use a oven mitt to remove . It suggest to put flour on stone so pizza will not stick , I find the flour burns to the stone , I have not used any flour and it does not stick , my backyard BBQ's are now pizza BBQ's
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cleaning is difficult
customer_reviews.text: Oven is great cooks the pizza as expected. Cleaning and Maitenance is a bit difficult and the stone will blacken with ash over time
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Great pizza oven. First few times we had problems with top burning and bottom undone. I'm not sure if stone needed to season or something else, but it has been phenomenal ever since. Very handy addition to outdoor kitchen for warming up many other items.
customer_reviews.author: Lee B. Little Rock, AR

customer_reviews.title: Makes great pizza , fast for multiple pizzas
customer_reviews.text: I love how it heats up in about 15 minutes and maintains a high temperature ( which is selectable) between 550 and 700. The oven is big enough to cook two smaller pizzas at the same time . Pizzas cook in about 3 to 4 minutes
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: This oven was a good price but was delivered with a missing handle and ...
customer_reviews.text: This oven was a good price but was delivered with a missing handle and the build in thermometer is broken on the top. Otherwise, we would be pretty happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Dina G.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. Easy to use and my family loved the pizza!
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne A. Rockwell

customer_reviews.title: Great oven
customer_reviews.text: My son-in-law loves this gift that he got for Christmas it cooks pizza fast,And delicious
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: Good unit but door handle broke in a week
customer_reviews.text: Had the unit for less than a week and the handle for the door to the unit already broke ... maybe touched it 3 times and now it’s broke.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Keyes

customer_reviews.title: Tons of fun
customer_reviews.text: Well made and easy to use. Makes a great pizza.
customer_reviews.author: John Muir

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this pizza oven
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this pizza oven. Bought for a gift but have gotten to eat the pizzas that come out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Overcash

customer_reviews.title: We love making home made pizza in the pizza oven
customer_reviews.text: Aewsome! We love making home made pizza in the pizza oven. The crust comes out perfect. We have had several pizza parties since buying this for my husband and its been great fun!
customer_reviews.author: Kurt L. Umscheid

customer_reviews.title: Love our pizza oven
customer_reviews.text: We love this pizza oven. It's amazing and super easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: M litwin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: our family loves pizaa and this makes a great homemade pizza.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Jean Matsko Hood, Author and Poet

customer_reviews.title: Best tasting home made crust ever
customer_reviews.text: Best tasting home made crust ever. I use it for bread baking and so far have cooked chicken and whole fish in it. During Summer time I like to cook outside and keep my house cool
customer_reviews.author: oleg babich

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We were making perfect pizza within 2 hours of receiving the oven. Absolutely fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Z

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great way to feed a group pizza. Easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Kip

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Pizza Oven
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable product! The pizza turned out amazing on the first try. Crispy thin crust in just three minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Misha

customer_reviews.title: It's is easy to use and makes a fine pizza
customer_reviews.text: My Son loves his new pizza oven. It's is easy to use and makes a fine pizza! It shipped very quickly and arrived in good shape. It took 5 minutes to put together. Thank-you!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel  Cetrone

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love it wish they has a natural gas conversion kit
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: We added this to our outdoor kitchen and absolutely love it. The only downside is if it is windy it can be difficult to control the temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Garcia

customer_reviews.title: fantastic performance. Cooked in > 100 degree outdoor temp ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this last sept, fantastic performance. Cooked in > 100 degree outdoor temp to 30 degrees F. Takes a bit of experimenting as outdoor temp affect cooking time and the need to rotate the pizza. Only issue is the raised lip on the stone has chipped off in many places from using the cleaning scrapper. Be sure to use the IR thermometer if you want consistent results.
customer_reviews.author: David D. Lauriano

product_meta.title: Camp Chef Italia Artisan Pizza Oven
product_meta.description:
Camp Chef: the Way to Cook Outdoors

The brick ovens of Italy are renowned for legendary artisan pizzas, with perfectly crisp crust and toppings melded together. Now enjoy true artisan style pizza on your own patio with the portable Italia Artisan Pizza Oven. Specially designed features replicate the performance of a wood-fired brick oven - from its double walled construction and specially designed burners to its ventilation and cordierite ceramic pizza stone. Micro-adjust valves give you heat control and responsiveness to cook perfect artisan pizza every time. Features:

Double layered ceiling enhances heating dynamics, bakes like a brick oven Preheat and ready to cook in 15 minutes Built-in valve ignition/micro-adjust valve give you total flame control Built-in temperature gauge monitor internal air temps Ventilated oven door with handle Stainless steel construction is easy to clean 17,000 BTU specially designed burner and heat plates Oven can reach temperatures upwards of 700° F Perfect for pizza, baking breads, roasting meats and more Runs on a 1-lb disposable propane bottle Regulator and 5 ft. hose included to adapt to standard bulk propane tank Specifications:

Overall Dimensions without shelf: 15" x 26" x 16" Stone Dimensions: 13.25" x 20" Oven Opening Dimensions: 22.25" x 4.25" Shelf Dimensions: 5" x 23" Total Output: 17,000 BTU/hr Weight: 47 lbs.
feature_bullets: Double layered ceiling enhances heating dynamics, bakes like a brick oven
Built-in valve ignition/micro-adjust valve give you total flame control
Stainless steel construction is easy to clean
Stove Dimensions: 13.25" x 20" - Oven Opening Dimensions: 22.25" x 4.25" - Shelf Dimensions: 5" x 23"

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
